item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Generative Textile Design Tools
item.description: Generative textile design tools use transformative algorithms to include data in the design stage optimizing digital textile design for multiple objectives simultaneously.
